name: GUACUCO
description:
Guacuco is an experimental interactive diorama about confronting traumatic memories and letting them go.  You're stuck in your nightmares, and the only way out is to face your pain, gather all your memories, and return them to the flow of time.

  • A short, atmospheric narrative experience written and designed by Sol Martínez-Solé; around five to ten minutes long.
  • Featuring poignant music by the incredibly talented avyary.
  • Programmed by Jeremy Diamond, with support by Javier Calderón, Jannik Boysen, and Daniel Del Río.
  • Produced by Oyoun, funded by Fonds Soziokultur from the program of the BKM "NEUSTART KULTUR".

Contains depictions of racism, homophobia, and transphobia.

Keyboard and mouse + downloading the game recommended for the best play experience.
